## Top Navigation Bar (Header)

**Required on every page.**

- **Component:** `src/components/Header.tsx`
- **Features:**
  - Hamburger menu toggle (left)
  - Clickable brand logo (home)
  - Search bar
  - Live date/time (updates every second)
  - Breadcrumbs
- **Styling:**
  - Fixed height: 92px
  - Sticky at top
  - White with blur
  - Bottom border and shadow

## Hamburger Menu Sidebar

**Required on every page.**

- **Component:** `src/components/Sidebar.tsx`
- **Features:**
  - Collapsible menu
  - Desktop: can be pinned (shifts content)
  - Mobile: overlay mode
  - Resizable width: 200pxâ€“500px (default 280px)
  - 6 nav items: Dashboard, Search, Add Customer, Breeds, Analytics, History
  - Active state highlighting
  - Live date at bottom
- **Styling:**
  - White with blur
  - Right border and shadow
  - Header height: 92px

**Summary:** Both are mandatory on every page. The header is always visible at the top; the sidebar toggles via the hamburger and can be pinned on desktop.
